item.title: Projection Mapping with CHiKA
item.description:
We had a lesson from installation artist CHiKA on Wednesday. She dropped by to tell us how to get started with projection mapping, and use Modul8 and MadMapper.

Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Suspendisse potenti. Morbi sagittis nisl eu tincidunt maximus. Integer pretium nisl sed nunc semper, in dapibus turpis ullamcorper.

item.title: Volumetric Imaging with Looking Glass
item.description:
Thanks to the guys from Looking Glass for showing us how to program their cubes. Integer vel aliquam mauris, nec facilisis quam. Donec faucibus vitae nulla id aliquam. Proin sit amet sapien ante. Donec ut mollis mi, sodales maximus mi.

They also showed us how to use Structure to scan our heads - quite bizarre. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas.
